snippet: Gunmen and suicide bombers attacked Kabul International Airport before dawn on Monday, Afghan officials said.
abstract: Gunmen and suicide bombers attack periphery of Afghanistan's Kabul International Airport, shutting it down for four hours; Taliban take responsibility for attack.

byline.original: By SHARIFULLAH SAHAK and ALISSA J. RUBIN

lead_paragraph: Gunmen and suicide bombers attacked Kabul International Airport before dawn on Monday, Afghan officials said.

headline.main: Gunmen and Bombs Target Kabul Airport
headline.print_headline: Gunmen and Bombs Target Kabul Airport
